item.description:
Peer Critique Session

Saturday, May 5

3:30-5:30 PM

Aurora Gallery

660 Main Street, Worcester

Â 

ArtsWorcester members are invited to bring one piece of in-progress, or recently completed visual artwork to be presented for feedback. Registration is required for this event. Donna Dufault, of Erb Photography, will insure everyone gets an equal chance to present their work. When presenting the work, the artist should be prepared to offer information on the inspiration, technical process, intention of the piece and the area they are looking for feedback on. The group will be asked to offer feedback that describes, analyzes and interprets the work with a focus on constructive criticism. We encourage works in progress for the upcoming exhibition "Summer's Lease," but works need not be intended for it.

This event is free for ArtsWorcester members; a $10 fee is required of non-members. All categories of visual art can be presented. Artists are responsible for transporting works to and from the gallery. An easel and pedestal will be available to display the artwork. Free parking is available at the Freemasons, 1 Ionic Avenue.

Register by Wednesday, May 2, 2012 with a call to 508-755-5142 or an email to cynthia@artsworcester.org.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Critique Session
